author: J Jackson
comment: I hate the parralax thing going on, just does not look good IMHO. I also hate the shake to see date option. I would actually give this between 4 and 5 stars giving I could turn off the parralax and make the date appear without shaking my wrist.
title: Has potential but....

author: John Nikolakis
comment: The design is nice but that parallax thing is Simply horrible. Also the designed by on the top just looks bad. Find a more natural way to incorporate it (do you really need to?) than slamming horrible font on the top.
title: Parallax is horrible

author: Nick Chamberlin
comment: Eventually appeared on moto 360 after uninstalling and reinstalling it a few times. The parallax effect is absolutely horrid, it ruins the whole thing. That and the "created by" text. Nobody is going to remember your company name from a watch face you have to be 3 inches away from to read. All it does is make the watch face seem cheap, feels like an advertisement. Put the date on the face, shaking your wrist is stupid. Stop creating gimmicks. You have a good thing here if you'd listen to your users.
title: Parallax feature ruins it

author: Marco Yeung
comment: Nice animations with gyro. The "Ok Google" text is blocking the time. Move that somewhere else please. The date bear pops up every time you wake up the watch. It should only pop up when I shake the wrist when I'm not in dimmed mode.
title: Can be better

author: Michele McDermott
comment: This watch face is cute but the date is all wrong. If you don't need to know the correct date it's perfect!***. Oh thank you I'm going to reinstall it right now! ##### I installed this watch face again. Now we have a new problem, the bear does show the right date, but I have to restart the watch each day  in order for the date to reset! I don't plan on doing that Daily it's ridiculous!  Please fix or uninstalling!!!

reply.author: MEDICOM TOY CORPORATION
reply.content: Dear customer, Thank you for your comments. We have fixed the date issue so please uninstall & re-install the watch face on the mobile devices. The issue with the date will not longer appear.

title: Cute BUT..

author: Kristina Taylor
comment: Okay this is my favorite watchface & I think I have them all. But my bear needs help, he's a bit lost. Sometimes he pops up & has the correct date. Such as today he was red & said Jan. 1, 2015. Now he is blue & says the date is Wed. the 31st. Please help my bear I don't want to use the other watch faces....but he is just so darn cute & I love the colors of the watch face! Can you please help my bear? I'm more than willing to pay if you can fix him :-) I am using this face on a ZenWatch & Galaxy Gear Live if that info helps.

reply.author: MEDICOM TOY CORPORATION
reply.content: Dear customer, Thank you for your comments. We have fixed the date issue so please uninstall & re-install the watch face on the mobile devices. The issue with the date will not longer appear.

title: I would love to give it 5 stars but......

author: Matt Shockley
comment: The parallax effect detracts from the style and legibility ('ok Google' hovering right on top of the time.) Was expecting more customization. Nice design but the execution could be better!
title: Screenshots look better

author: Jenny Eldershaw
comment: Lovely watch face but the date is always one day behind....Thurs 26th March today and its actually Fri 26th. Reinstalled all and re-synced Sony SW3, both running android 5 but no joy. Shame. Any idea why, people? You'd get 5 stars if you could fix this. And YES..this was written after your date fix.
title: Disappointing

author: Jak Khawk
comment: Nice animated second's bezel that's functional. Clean face n cool Bear pops up for added detail
title: Issues with date not updating!

author: Lau Bunny
comment: However, I've uninstalled and re-installed the app on jan 11 but the date issue still exist. I'm using Gear Live.
title: Great design

author: Andy Barber
comment: Great design of this watch face and first installed when I got the wear 5.0 update!  Love the motion when tilting watch and face colours. Just need more customisations for 5 stars.
title: Sweet!

author: Adam Dechanel
comment: Date sometimes gets stuck... Would like colours introduced too overall a really slick face!
title: Great face!

author: Linus Chew
comment: Pop up date does not update when day has passed. And it persisted even after uninstall n re-install
title: Pop up date does not update

author: Juan Garza
comment: Date doesn't updated unless I restart my watch. Looks good. Like the dynamic pop up date bear. Maybe some additional bear colors or customizing?
